page.title: 15Population
page.content: There are only 6 inhabitants in the grid square.Mr and Mrs Mills and two daughters at the Gillerthwaite centre owned by the Leeds Polytechnic.This Field study Centre is visited by many schools from this county and further afield. Mr.R.Orrell is a well known person of Cumbria,because he broad casts on a radio station called"Radio Cumbria".He has also written two books based on travelling round the Lake District on a pack horse. The other inhabitent is a lady who is a warden of a Youth Hostel.
